short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your fit with Fitbit's family of fitness products that help you stay motivated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the big picture on your health and fitness journey with the Fitbit app. Find easy ways to get active, sleep better, stress less and eat healthier.

Track the stats you care about across health, fitness and sleep, and change your goals as your routines evolve. Stay motivated with energizing workout content for your body and mind. See how far you’ve come with a glance at your personal goal progress and how you stack up to friends and family. Unlock even more possibilities when you sync up with a wearable device like Fitbit tracker or smartwatch and see how your activity, sleep, nutrition and stress all fit together.






























Enhance your experience on the Fitbit website with the "Fitbit Activity Trackers & More" Chrome extension. This extension adds useful features that improve usability and comfort while browsing your Fitbit account.

Features:
Brightness Control: Adjust the brightness of the Fitbit website using an easy-to-use slider. Find your perfect screen setting to reduce eye strain, especially in low-light environments.

Dark Mode: Instantly switch to a dark mode to make late-night browsing more comfortable and visually pleasing. This mode changes the website’s background to a dark theme, reducing glare and saving your eyes from strain.
